itl.enabler.api

Class Hose

  • java.lang.Object
    • itl.enabler.api.ForecourtItem
      • itl.enabler.api.Hose

  • public class Hose
extends ForecourtItem
    The hose object provides information about a Dispenser Hose.

    This object has only properties, (no methods ).

    Hose objects are published via

    • Pump Hose property
    • Transaction Hose property

    • Method Detail

      • addHoseEventListener

        public void addHoseEventListener(Hose.HoseEventListener ev)
        Adds an event listener to the list of registered event listeners for the Hose class
        See Also:
        Hose.HoseEventListener

      • getBlockedReasons

        public java.util.EnumSet<HoseBlockedReasons> getBlockedReasons()
        Returns:
        the reason for which this Hose is blocked

      • getGrade

        public Grade getGrade()
        Returns:
        a reference to the Grade object assigned to this hose

      • getMoneyTotal

        public double getMoneyTotal()
        Returns:
        the electronic money total associated with this hose.

        This is the total (money) value of fuel delivered at this hose as indicated by the electronic counter in the dispenser.

        Since this value is returned by the dispenser, the value will be reset if the counter in the dispenser is reset, and will wrap around at the maximum total supported by the dispenser.

        If the dispenser or protocol does not support electronic totals this property will return zero.

      • getPump

        public Pump getPump()
        Returns:
        a reference to the Pump object this hose belongs to

      • getQuantityTotal

        public double getQuantityTotal()
        Returns:
        the electronic quantity/volume total associated with this hose.

        This is the total quantity (usually volume) of fuel delivered at this hose as indicated by the electronic counter in the dispenser.

        Since this value is returned by the dispenser, the value will be reset if the counter in the dispenser is reset, and will wrap around at the maximum total supported by the dispenser.

        If the dispenser or protocol does not support electronic totals this property will return zero.

      • getQuantityTotal2

        public double getQuantityTotal2()
        Returns:
        the electronic quantity/volume total associated with the 2nd grade for blended pumps.

      • getTank1

        public Tank getTank1()
        Returns:
        a reference to the Tank object this hose is connected to.

      • getTank2

        public Tank getTank2()
        Returns:
        a reference to the 2nd Tank object this hose is connected to.

        A second tank will be associated with a hose on a blending pump

        Note : If no second tank is associated with the hose Tank2 will return null

      • isBlocked

        public boolean isBlocked()
        Returns:
        Indicates whether this hose is currently blocked.

        A hose can be blocked if the associated Grade or Tank is blocked.

      • setBlocked

        public void setBlocked(boolean blocked)
                throws EnablerException
        Throws:
        EnablerException

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a string representing the grade name and ID associated with this hose
